-----
 - updated doctests

1.0.3
-----
 - modified catalog cache key adapter
 - updated doctests

1.0.2
-----
 - added "autocommit" argument to "index_site" function, used for testing purposes
 - updated doctests

1.0.1
-----
 - updated Gitlab-CI tests and integration

1.0.0
-----
 - initial release
